pathAssistantSteps.info:
Guidance for Success

Document the reason for denial

Guidance for Success

Monitor process status, support the interview process


  1. Serve as contact between IRCC and refugees and sponsors
  2. Update ROC-O and VOs of any changes to applications - add members, change of contact info
  3. Prepare documents and updated applications required by VO for interview
  4. Check status online

Guidance for Success

Clean and archive files as needed

Guidance for Success

Determine eligibility of refugee


  1. Gather info on refugee - UNHCR Refugee Status Determination (RSD) or from govt of COA 
  2. Assurance of funds (relatives, or if not, a parish)
  3. Determine parish/CG
  4. Meet with co-sponsor and CG

Guidance for Success

Settle the family, ensure financial support


  1. Welcome at the airport
  2. Newcomers orientation
  3. Issue quarterly reports
  4. Send reminders regarding financial support
  5. Home visits
  6. Gather documentation
  7. Conduct Exit Interview

Guidance for Success

Prepare for arrival of family


  1. Update the Settlement Plan and budget; ensure CG/co-sponsors are ready with trust fund
  2. Pre-Arrival training for co-sponsors and CG
  3. Get contact info for airport pickup; provide the info to IRCC and CANN YVR

Guidance for Success

Gather and ensure correct and complete applications for submission to ROC-O


  1. Receive signed applications and documents, refugee story, photos from refugee/co-sponsor
  2. Receive sponsors applications from co-sponsor and CG
  3. Ensure all applications are filled out correctly
  4. Submit application packet by email
  5. Ensure auto-reply is received from ROC-O when application email is sent

Guidance for Success

Assist with Secondary Migration


  1. Assist in filling out IMM5373 (signed by JB)
  2. If no new SAH, continue monitoring sponsorship

Guidance for Success

Document the reason for withdrawal
